{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3336898,"name":"Declan Dunn","username":"Declan0811","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/declan0811/{size}/213245_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-19T12:58:02.378Z","cooked":"

Rookie team here, so this may be a stupid question, but when we were at our most recent qualifier, many of the teams that had more advanced autonomous modes had a field layout on their driver’s station that they used to visualize its autonomous mode and determine their bot’s position on the field. What was this dashboard element, and how do teams make such advanced autos?
Sorry if this was an ignorant question, but I just wanted to find out exactly what it was.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":4,"updated_at":"2024-03-19T12:58:02.378Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":97,"readers_count":96,"score":44.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":459240,"topic_slug":"field-layout-window-in-drivers-station-and-used-for-autonomous","display_username":"Declan Dunn","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63796,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Captain"},"post_url":"/t/field-layout-window-in-drivers-station-and-used-for-autonomous/459240/1","custom_user_title":"Captain","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3336901,"name":"","username":"Akash_Rastogi","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/akash_rastogi/{size}/169937_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-19T13:00:37.459Z","cooked":"

Not ignorant at all!

What you saw was most likely PathPlanner. It is created by team 3015.

https://pathplanner.dev/home.html

If teams were replaying their robot pose and autos, it could have also be AdvantageScope (can be used separately from AdvantageKit) created by team 6328.

AdvantageKit 2024: Log Replay, Again! Programming
[AdvantageKit Banner] AdvantageKit is a log replay and simulation framework developed by Team 6328. Its core objective is to enable all code logic to be replayed in simulation based on a log file, so you can debug complex issues, log new fields that were never recorded in the first place, and even retune compatible systems without needing a real robot. For more details, check out the What is AdvantageKit? page or my conference from the 2023 Championship: [FRC Data Logging and Visualiz…
